      • absorbAndRedact

        public static void absorbAndRedact(java.lang.String item,
                                   com.aspose.pdf.Document pdfDocument)
        Absorbs and redacts all instances of the term to be redacted in the PDF document
        Parameters:
        item - - the current item in the list of terms to be redacted
        pdfDocument - - the pdf document which will be migrated and applied with redaction

        Parameters:

        replacement - - the String replacement that will be used to replace the textFragment
